## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1840b4a7994a37a6c10110bc38f5ee5070ab520e0643d3c22e1772c77af3bcfe)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ai-app-foundation' @ 90.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
